support_skills.name: Inspiration
support_skills.effect: With each successful standard attack, gain SP equal to 1% of the damage you deal.

support_skills.name: Hale and Hearty
support_skills.effect: Increases maximum HP by 500.

support_skills.name: Resist Ailments
support_skills.effect: Improves resistance to poison, sleep, confusion, blindness, silence, terror, and unconsciousness.

support_skills.name: Heightened Healing
support_skills.effect: Gain an additional 30% HP or SP when being healed or restored.

support_skills.name: Persistence
support_skills.effect: All status enhancements you receive will last one additional turn.

support_skills.name: Inner Strength
support_skills.effect: Increase the maximum SP of the equipped character by 50.

support_skills.name: Evil Ward
support_skills.effect: Increases the party's success rate when attempting to flee. (Equipping this skill with multiple characters will have no added effect)

support_skills.name: Saving Grace
support_skills.effect: Grants the equipping character the ability to be healed above their maximum HP.

support_skills.name: The Show Goes On
support_skills.effect: Status augmentations you grant to allies will persist for one additional turn.

support_skills.name: Eye for an Eye
support_skills.effect: 50% chance to counterattack when hit.

support_skills.name: Second Wind
support_skills.effect: Recover a certain amount of SP each turn.

support_skills.name: Encore
support_skills.effect: Once per battle, upon being incapacitated you will recover with 25% of your maximum HP.

support_skills.name: Heighten Senses
support_skills.effect: Gain an increased chance of attack first in a battle. (Equipping this skill with multiple characters will have no added effect)

support_skills.name: Eagle Eye
support_skills.effect: Increases the critical of the equipped character by 50.

support_skills.name: Second Serving
support_skills.effect: Gives the equipping character a 50% chance of attacking twice when performing a standard attack.

support_skills.name: Patience
support_skills.effect: At the end of the turn, gives the equipped character a 25% chance of moving again

support_skills.name: Endless Items
support_skills.effect: When a character with this skill uses an item, there is a 25% chance the item will not be consumed.

support_skills.name: Grows on Trees
support_skills.effect: Increases money earned.

support_skills.name: Hang Tough
support_skills.effect: When the user is not near death, all attacks that would reduce the user's HP below zero will instead leave the user with 1 HP.

support_skills.name: SP Saver
support_skills.effect: Halves SP consumption for the equipping character.

support_skills.name: Evasive Maneuvers
support_skills.effect: Reduces the rate of random encounters. (Equipping this skill with multiple characters will have no added effect)

support_skills.name: Elemental Augmentation
support_skills.effect: Augments the equipping character's elemental attack strength by 50.

support_skills.name: Percipience
support_skills.effect: Prevents the party from being surprised by foes. (Equipping this skill with multiple characters will have no added effect)

support_skills.name: Vim and Vigor
support_skills.effect: The equipping character will regenerate HP each turn. (10% of max health)

support_skills.name: Incidental Attack
support_skills.effect: When using a non-damaging skill on a foe, there is a 50% chance you will attack as well.

support_skills.name: Fleetfoot
support_skills.effect: Augments the equipping character's speed by 50.

support_skills.name: Snatch
support_skills.effect: The equipping character will receive double the loot when using Steal or Collect skills.

support_skills.name: Insult to Injury
support_skills.effect: Status ailments and attribute penalties inflicted by equipping character will last for one additional turn.

support_skills.name: Cover
support_skills.effect: The equipping character will absorb single-targeted damage for allies who are near death.

support_skills.name: Summon Strength
support_skills.effect: Increases the physical strength of the equipping character by 50.

support_skills.name: Endure
support_skills.effect: When the equipping character is afflicted with poison, sleep, confusion, blindness, silence, terror, or unconsciousness, their physical and elemental defenses are enhanced.

support_skills.name: Surpassing Power
support_skills.effect: Increases the maximum damage that can be dealt by the equipping character to 99,999.

support_skills.name: Stat Swap
support_skills.effect: Elemental and physical attack strength will be swapped with one another.

support_skills.name: SP Recovery
support_skills.effect: Upon taking damage from a foe, gain an amount of SP equal to 1% of damage taken.

support_skills.name: Dauntless
support_skills.effect: Gain increased physical and elemental attack when suffering from a status ailment.

support_skills.name: Elemental Edge
support_skills.effect: Gain augmented elemental attack and defense in battle.

support_skills.name: Intimidation
support_skills.effect: Grants a 25% chance that foes will begin battle with reduced physical attack and elemental attack*. (Equipping this skill with multiple characters will have no added effect)

support_skills.name: Stronger Strikes
support_skills.effect: Increases damage dealt when striking a foe's weak point.

support_skills.name: Elemental Aid
support_skills.effect: Elemental attacks consume double SP, but also deal more damage.

support_skills.name: Augmented Elements
support_skills.effect: Increase damage dealt by elemental attacks.

support_skills.name: Hard Worker
support_skills.effect: Gain additional JP after battles. (Equipping this skill with multiple characters will have no added effect)

support_skills.name: Boost-Start
support_skills.effect: Gain an additional 1BP at the start of battle

support_skills.name: BP Eater
support_skills.effect: Boosted skills performed by the equipping character deal additional damage.

support_skills.name: Divine Aura
support_skills.effect: The equipping character gains a 25% chance of nullifying any damage taken.

support_skills.name: Extra Experience
support_skills.effect: Gain additional experience from battles. (Equipping this skill with multiple characters will have no added effect)

support_skills.name: Stalwart Defense
support_skills.effect: Increase physical defense by 50.

support_skills.name: Fortitude
support_skills.effect: Deal more damage the lower your current HP is.

support_skills.name: Physical Prowess
support_skills.effect: Augments physical attack and defense during battle.

Apothecary.name: First Aid
Apothecary.effect: Restores HP to a single ally.

Apothecary.name: Icicle
Apothecary.effect: Deal ice damage to a signel foe.

Apothecary.name: Rehabilitate
Apothecary.effect: Cure a single ally of all status ailments, and render them immue to further ailments for 2 turns.

Apothecary.name: Amputation
Apothecary.effect: Unleash an axe attack on a single foe.

Apothecary.name: Empoison
Apothecary.effect: Poison a single foe for 2 turns.

Apothecary.name: Last Stand
Apothecary.effect: Attack all foes with an axe, dealing damage inversely proportional to your current HP.

Apothecary.name: Dohter's Charity
Apothecary.effect: [Divine Skill] For 3 turns, items used by a single chosen ally will affect all.

Cleric.name: Holy Light
Cleric.effect: Inflict light-based damage on a single foe.

Cleric.name: Sheltering Veil
Cleric.effect: Augment a single ally's elemental defense for 2 turns.

Cleric.name: Luminescence
Cleric.effect: Deal light-based damage to all foes.

Cleric.name: Heal More
Cleric.effect: Restore a large amount of HP to all allies.

Cleric.name: Reflective Veil
Cleric.effect: Grant a single ally the ability to reflect one elemental attack.

Cleric.name: Aelfric's Auspices
Cleric.effect: For 3 turns, skills performed by a single chosen ally will trigger twice (this will not affect other divine skills).

Dancer.name: Lion Dance
Dancer.effect: Augment a single ally's physical attacks for 2 turns.

Dancer.name: Moonlight Waltz
Dancer.effect: Deal heavy dark damage to a single foe.

Dancer.name: Peacock Strut
Dancer.effect: Augment a single ally's elemental attacks for 2 turns.

Dancer.name: Mole Dance
Dancer.effect: Augment a single ally's physical defense for 2 turns.

Dancer.name: Night Ode
Dancer.effect: Deal dark damage to all foes.

Dancer.name: Panther Dance
Dancer.effect: Augment a single ally's speed for 2 turns.

Dancer.name: Bewildering Grace
Dancer.effect: Cause a curious effect to occur one time.

Dancer.name: Sealticge's Seduction
Dancer.effect: [Divine Skill] For 3 turns, skills performed by a single ally that usually target one foe (or ally) will affect all foes (or allies) instead (this will not affect divine skills).

Hunter.name: Rain of Arrows
Hunter.effect: Attack random foes 5 to 8 times with a bow.

Hunter.name: True Strike
Hunter.effect: Deal critical damage with a bow to a single foe.

Hunter.name: Thunderbird
Hunter.effect: Deal heavy lightning damage to a single foe.

Hunter.name: Leghold Trap
Hunter.effect: Cause a single foe to act at the end of the turn for 2 turns.

Hunter.name: Mercy Strike
Hunter.effect: Attack a single foe with a bow. Otherwise lethal attacks will instead leave the target with 1HP.

Hunter.name: Arrowstorm
Hunter.effect: Attack all foes 5 to 8 times with a bow.

Hunter.name: Take Aim
Hunter.effect: Increases all allies' critical rate and accuracy for 2 turns.

Hunter.name: Draefendi's Rage
Hunter.effect: [Divine Skill] Unleash a highly powerful bow attack on all foes.

Merchant.name: Collect
Merchant.effect: Collect money from a single foe.

Merchant.name: Tradewinds
Merchant.effect: Deal heavy wind damage to a single foe.

Merchant.name: Rest
Merchant.effect: Restore one's own HP and SP, and cure ailments.

Merchant.name: Trade Tempest
Merchant.effect: Deal wind damage to all foes.

Merchant.name: Sidestep
Merchant.effect: Dodge a single physical attack with a 100% success rate.

Merchant.name: Hired Help
Merchant.effect: Pay money to summon hired help to the battlefield.

Merchant.name: Bifelgan's Bounty
Merchant.effect: Unleash a non-elemental attack on a single foe and receive money equivalent to the damage dealt.

Scholar.name: Fireball
Scholar.effect: Deal fire damage to all foes.

Scholar.name: Icewind
Scholar.effect: Deal ice damage to all foes.

Scholar.name: Lightning Bolt
Scholar.effect: Deal lightning damage to all foes.

Scholar.name: Analyze
Scholar.effect: Reveal the HP and one weakness of a single foe.

Scholar.name: Fire Storm
Scholar.effect: Deal fire damage to all foes twice.

Scholar.name: Blizzard
Scholar.effect: Deal ice damage to all foes twice.

Scholar.name: Lightning Blast
Scholar.effect: Deal lightning damage to all foes twice.

Scholar.name: Alephan's Enlightenment
Scholar.effect: [Divine Skill] For 3 turns, spells cast by a single chosen ally that usually target all foes will instead be focused on a single foe at increased intensity.

Thief.name: Steal
Thief.effect: Steal an item from a single foe.

Thief.name: Wildfire
Thief.effect: Deal heavy fire damage to a single foe.

Thief.name: HP Thief
Thief.effect: Attack a single foe twice with a dagger, and steal HP equivalent to half of the damage dealt.

Thief.name: Shackle Foe
Thief.effect: Reduce a single foe's physical attack strength for 2 turns.

Thief.name: Armor Corrosive
Thief.effect: Reduce a single foe's physical defense for 2 turns.

Thief.name: Steal SP
Thief.effect: Attack a single foe twice with a dagger, and steal SP equivalent to 5% of the damage dealt.

Thief.name: Share SP
Thief.effect: Bestow SP equivalent to 50% of one's current SP to a single ally.

Thief.name: Aeber's Reckoning
Thief.effect: [Divine Skill] Attack all foes with a dagger, dealing damage proportional to your speed.

Warrior.name: Level Slash
Warrior.effect: Attack all foes with a sword.

Warrior.name: Abide
Warrior.effect: Increase the user's physical attack strength for 3 turns.

Warrior.name: Spearhead
Warrior.effect: Attack a single foe with a polearm, and act earlier on your next turn.

Warrior.name: Incite
Warrior.effect: Become more readily targeted by foes for 3 turns.

Warrior.name: Cross Strike
Warrior.effect: Unlease a sword attack on a single foe.

Warrior.name: Stout Wall
Warrior.effect: Increase the user's physical defense for 3 turns.

Warrior.name: Thousand Spears
Warrior.effect: Attack random foes with a polearm 5 to 10 times.

Warrior.name: Brand's Thunder
Warrior.effect: [Divine Skill] Unlease a tremendously powerful sword attack on a single foe.

Runelord.name: Fire Rune
Runelord.effect: Weapons the user attacks with will deal additional fire damage for 3 turns.

Runelord.name: Ice Rune
Runelord.effect: Weapons the user attacks with will deal additional ice damage for 3 turns.

Runelord.name: Thunder Rune
Runelord.effect: Weapons the user attacks with will deal additional lightning damage for 3 turns.

Runelord.name: Wind Rune
Runelord.effect: Weapons the user attacks with will deal additional wind damage for 3 turns.

Runelord.name: Dark Rune
Runelord.effect: Weapons the user attacks with will deal additional dark damage for 3 turns.

Runelord.name: Light Rune
Runelord.effect: Weapons the user attacks with will deal additional light damage for 3 turns.

Runelord.name: Transfer rune
Runelord.effect: For 3 turns, skills that usually target yourself alone will target your allies as well.

Runelord.name: Balogar's Blade
Runelord.effect: [Divine Skill] Deal damage from each of the six elements to a single foe.

Sorcerer.name: Ignis Ardere
Sorcerer.effect: Deal fire damage to all foes 3 times.

Sorcerer.name: Glacies Caludere
Sorcerer.effect: Deal ice damage to all foes 3 times.

Sorcerer.name: Tonitrus Canere
Sorcerer.effect: Deal lightning damage to all foes 3 times.

Sorcerer.name: Ventus Saltare
Sorcerer.effect: Deal wind damage to all foes 3 times.

Sorcerer.name: Lux Congerere
Sorcerer.effect: Deal light damage to all foes 3 times.

Sorcerer.name: Tenebrae Operiere
Sorcerer.effect: Deal dark damage to all foes 3 times.

Sorcerer.name: Elemental Break
Sorcerer.effect: Unleash a powerful staff attack on a single foe that also reduces the target's elemental defense for 2 turns.

Sorcerer.name: Dreisang's Spell
Sorcerer.effect: [Divine Skill] For 3 turns, elemental attacks performed by a single chosen ally will hit for critical damage.

Starseer.name: Shotting Stars
Starseer.effect: Deal wind, light, and dark damage to all foes.

Starseer.name: BP Boost
Starseer.effect: Allow a single ally to gain 2 BP per turn for 2 turns.

Starseer.name: Divination
Starseer.effect: Increase a single ally's critical hit rate for 2 turns.

Starseer.name: Starsong
Starseer.effect: Augments a single ally's physical defense, elemental defense, speed, and evasion for 2 turns.

Starseer.name: Celestial Intervention
Starseer.effect: For 2 turns, render a single enemy unable to receive attribute augmentations, or a single ally immune to attribute penalties.

Starseer.name: Ethereal Healing
Starseer.effect: Grant HP regeneration to all allies for 2 turns.

Starseer.name: Moon's Reflection
Starseer.effect: Grant a single ally the ability to counter physical damage one time.

Starseer.name: Steorra's Prophecy
Starseer.effect: Unlease an elemental attack on all foes that deals damage proportional to the party's current BP.

Warmaster.name: Guardian Liondog
Warmaster.effect: Unleaes 5 to 10 sword attacks against random foes.

Warmaster.name: Tiger Rage
Warmaster.effect: Unleash an axe attack on all foes.

Warmaster.name: Qilin's Horn
Warmaster.effect: Unlease a polearm attack on a single foe.

Warmaster.name: Yatagarasu
Warmaster.effect: Unleash a dagger attack on all foes.

Warmaster.name: Fox Spirit
Warmaster.effect: Unleash a staff attack on all foes.

Warmaster.name: Phoenix Storm
Warmaster.effect: Unlease a bow attack on a single foe.

Warmaster.name: Nightmare Chimera
Warmaster.effect: Unleash an attack on a single foe using a weapon of your choice. The weapon will be destroyed.

Warmaster.name: Winnehild's Battle Cry
Warmaster.effect: [Divine Skill] Wield six weapons to unleash six attacks on all foes.
